Name:
Nürnberg
Admiral Makarov (Адмирал Макаров)
Fate:
Surrendered 1945. Assigned as a war prize to the Soviet Navy
Scrapped 1960
Displacement: 9,040 metric tons (8,900 long tons; 9,960 short tons)
Propulsion:
Steam turbines and Diesels
3 shafts (Diesels on center shaft)
60,000 shp (45 MW) turbines + 12,400 hp (9.3 MW) diesels
Range: 3,900 nautical miles (7,200 km; 4,500 mi) at 10 knots (19 km/h; 12 mph)
Armament:
9 × 15 cm SK C/25 guns
8 × 8.8 cm SK C/32 guns
8 × 3.7 cm SK C/30 guns
8 × 2 cm C/30 guns
12 × 53.3 cm (21.0 in) torpedo tubes
120 mines
Armor:
Belt armor: 50 mm (2.0 in)
Deck: 30 mm (1.2 in)
Conning tower: 100 mm (3.9 in)
